Name: NeoBalls2
About the game: We are glad to greet you again in the world of Neo. As before, you need to hit the target by shooting them NeoSphere. To destroy a target, you need to hit the specified number. Now triangles and balls were added to the usual targets. Calculate the angle so as to hit as many targets as possible. Do not forget the goals are in 2 rows. Collect NeoSphere to increase the number of your shots. To more accurately shoot use the bonus 'sight of the ball'.
